title: Is it immoral to sterilize people with certain medical conditions? - Quora

response.answer_text: If done with their permission and they fully understand what it means then it is OK. Without their permission it is not OK and is illegal, at least in America. But it is not a moral issue as morality is simply how we get along with each other and there is no dominate morality that is imposed from external to all of humanity. Morality is not a religious dictate.
